summary: Defines a collection of customized Django admin classes and utilities that extend the default admin interface for the registrar application. The module adds auditing, advanced sorting, inline editing, custom filters, workflow transition handling, and bulk actions such as exporting domain data, enabling administrators to efficiently manage domains, users, contacts, logs, and related entities.
business_intent: Provide administrators with a powerful, user‑friendly backend UI to control and audit registrar data, enforce role‑based access, streamline domain lifecycle operations, and maintain comprehensive change history.
